name: The Mercs
description:
THE MERCS

Manage a small team of mercenaries in this real time war strategy cartoon game

The game is currently on proof-of-concept stage ( so don't expect anything fancy :D )

How to play

Select units by left clicking, and then move them by right clicking on an empty spot on the map. All units attack their closest enemy automatically.  

Build your team

All units have different strength and weaknesses, make sure your team matches your playstyle and exploits of your enemies weaknesses.
